ComicInfo.Title: The Laughing Ghost; Deadly Rivals; Sentimental Journey; Music from the Grave
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Laughing Ghost: Newlyweds Peter and Barbara are tormented by a prankster ghost, until they manage to pull a fast one on him.
Deadly Rivals: In life, Andrew and Hiram were always competitive, always trying to upstage the other. Why should death put a stop to that?
Sentimental Journey: Coming back to his ancestral home, Lance finds more than he bargained for.
Music from the Grave: The great composer will not tolerate upstarts to compose concerts in his name.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 20:42:19. [CVDB186100] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 10:44:08. [Issue ID 26699]
